title: Crispy breadcrumbed squid with creamy ponzu dressing
description: Delicious crispy squid served alongside a zingy ponzu dressing makes the perfect starter for a dinner party.
ingredients: 2 tsp yuzu juice (available from some supermarkets and Asian grocers, or specialist online retailers), or to taste
salt and freshly ground black pepper
4 medium squid, cleaned, quills and beaks removed, sliced into 0.5cm/½in rings
